text:
At least the source code is ready now.
I made it possible to choose any of the defined LDAP operations, which makes 
building a testplan more flexible (and it takes more time to do it)

I included a new html file how to build an extended ldap testplan, including 
screenshots etc., as well as a short tutorial on LDAP operations.

I'm still working on the component reference (the documentation is not in patch 
format, as I couldn't get ecclipse to produce this for the html-files and 
screenshots)

I hope the docs so far are self explaining. If more information is needed, or 
bugs are found they can be reported to me, as I'm willing to maintain this as 
well.
